scripts.start: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & serve -p 3001
scripts.build-css: npm run build-less && npm run compress-less
scripts.compress: npm run compress-js && npm run compress-js-no-rbush
scripts.compress-js: browserify -s L.Control.LineStringSelect -u leaflet index.js | uglifyjs --comments -m -c drop_console=true,warnings=false > dist/L.Control.LineStringSelect.min.js
scripts.compress-js-no-rbush: browserify -s L.Control.LineStringSelect -u rbush -u leaflet index.js | uglifyjs --comments -m -c drop_console=true,warnings=false > dist/L.Control.LineStringSelect.no-rbush.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-js-no-rbush && npm run compress && npm run build-css
